content: Morale has collapsed, Yes because the leftwing socialists (err, ‘democratic socialists?) the liberal-progressives and just those wanting to make large careers out of a fake ongoing ‘sky is falling’ data-gaming hoax are.. ..the dying old ideas. The people of yesterday. Surely some had magnificent plans to be paid substantially to visit Paris for weeks at a time with hero status and righteous halos. Now they are being removed or rather ‘drained’ from their swamp. I bet they are pissed off!
